Warning:
On 27th August 2016 a client of the drug-checking service near Arezzo submitted a sample for examination, initially thinking it  was a Mescaline+2C-B pill, called Solaris.

The pill was very small and was yellow coloured. The sample was analysed using RAMAN Spectrometry and the result was Inconclusive. When analyzed by GC/MS it was found to contain 6ï¿½g/mg 25I-NBOMe.
